item.title: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine II ‘Reclamation’ update now available
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

New operation, hero weapons, stratagems, and rewards.

Publisher Focus Entertainment and developer Saber Interactive have released the “Reclamation” update for third-person action game Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine II, the companies announced.

The update adds the new Operation “Reclamation,” new hero weapons “Bolt Sniper Rifle,” “Heavy Bolter,” “Instigator Bolt Carbine,” “Heavy Bolt Pistol,” “Power Fist,” and “Thunder Hammer,” and new stratagems and rewards. For Season Pass II owners, the “Blood Angels Champion Pack” and “Salamanders Cosmetic Pack” are also available.

Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine II is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store.

item.title: LumenTale: Memories of Trey delayed to spring 2026
item.content:encoded:
• Switch

Explore the region of Talea in new trailer.

Publisher Team17 and developer Beehive Studios have delayed monster collector RPG LumenTale: Memories of Trey from its previously planned 2025 release window to spring 2026. It will be available for Switch and PC via Steam.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Embark on an unforgettable adventure with LumenTale: Memories of Trey, a captivating monster collector RPG set in a beautiful and enchanting world.

Discover an emotional tale of self-discovery, adventure through captivating regions each as unique as their people. Join Trey as he navigates his way through a land full of mystical creatures to reveal the mystery behind his lost memories.

Story

Long ago, in the golden era of Talea, the Emperor kept the lands peaceful, and the people prospered. After passing away without naming a successor between his twin sons, a civil war raged between the North, Logos and the South, Mythos – fighting for who would take control of the throne. The townsfolk lived in fear from the atrocities being carried out in the conflict. In a bid to stop the destruction, a part of the empire’s military became Talea’s dedicated protectors.

From the everlasting darkness of war, these people were the beacon of light that brought people hope. The Lumen were born, and as guardians in their provinces, they ensure the safety of the residents of Talea, both the people and the Animon.

Since ancient times, people have long studied the Animon. Not much is known of their nature to this day. They’re made of Anivis, an energy that flows through the whole world, and they possess the ability to affect emotions and interact with the very soul of every living being. Catch the Animon and become inseparable partners as you harness their elemental powers and battle alongside each other with your Holoken.

Key Features

  • Catching Animon – Test your skills with the Holoken and catch Animon in the field to recruit them to your party or initiate an incredible and exciting battle against them to prove your mettle! Every Animon can perform their own abilities and skills, and victory is achieved through using the best strategy with your team. There are around 140 known species with 13 elemental types, which are categorized with attributes depending on the emotion they’re able to evoke in people.
  • Battles – Engage in thrilling 1v1 duels or team up for epic four-versus-four showdowns with your party in battle. Level up your Animons and outsmart your opponents by using the best strategy to win. Each Animon has strengths and weaknesses for you to uncover, so use them to your advantage.
  • Trading – With up to three different ways to trade your Animon, you can effortlessly complete your collection and build the perfect battle team. Connect to the Animon Trade Station to seek the Animon you need, trade directly with friends, or the community.
  • Cook and Craft – While on your adventure, be sure to take a rest at the Fountain, where you’ll be able to craft useful items and cook delicious food! If you’re feeling adventurous, you’ll be able to experiment with ingredients to help nurture your Animon.
  • The Anispace – The Anispace is a place that exists and doesn’t exist at the same time. A space detached from the world as we know it. Here is where you’ll find your Animon after you capture them and where you’ll be able to train your Animon for battle. Customize their space when they’re not in your battle party and create stronger bonds with them!

Watch a new trailer below.

item.title: Hyrule Warriors: Age of Imprisonment free update launches November 27
item.content:encoded:
• Switch 2

New weapons, a new Sync Strike, and more.

Publisher Nintendo and Koei Tecmo developer AAA Games Studio will release a free update for Hyrule Warriors: Age of Imprisonment on November 27, the companies announced.

The announcement reads: “Take on fearsome enemies to earn additional in-game rewards including two new weapons, a new Sync Strike for Zelda and Calamo, and more.”

Further information about the update was not announced.

Hyrule Warriors: Age of Imprisonment is available now for Switch 2.

item.title: Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves DLC character Mr. Big launches December 9
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Ruthless ruler of Port Town.

Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves downloadable content character Mr. Big from Art of Fighting will launch on December 9, SNK announced.

Here is her character description, via SNK:

Mr. Big (voiced by Marc Graue in English, Yuki Arai in Japanese)

Ruthless ruler of Port Town. With the late Geese Howard long gone, he now aims to take South Town for himself—and, with Rock’s sickly mother under his watchful eye, no blood relation or rival power player can do a thing about it. Though the years have grayed him, the name “Big” retains its lethal luster; indeed, all who dare underestimate this boss of a man still earn themselves a one-way ticket to a very unhappy end.

Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store.

item.title: Octopath Traveler 0 details more companions, path actions, amity levels, party chat, and adventures at sea
item.content:encoded:
Publisher and developer Square Enix, and developer Dokidoki Grooveworks have released new information and screenshots for Octopath Traveler 0, introducing three more companions, path actions, amity levels, party chat, and adventures at sea.

Get the details below.

■ About

Set on the continent of Orsterra, the world of the original Octopath Traveler, Octopath Traveler 0 is a story of revenge and restoration surrounding the divine rings.

This time, we’ll delve into the various features that make this title special, including information about companions you’ll journey with, Path Actions, Amity Levels, Party Chat, and adventures at sea. We’ll also share latest updates and details about the demo

■ Travelers: Companions on Your Adventure

Delitia (voiced by Kendell Byrd in English, Ayaka Suwa in Japanese)

  • Job: Hunter

A hunter who grew up in the deserts of the Sunlands. She takes great pride in the clan she belongs to and wears a light traditional outfit. She is currently searching for her older brother who is next in line to be clan leader.

—Ultimate Technique: Gift of the Aqeeq

Lowers physical attack and physical defense of all foes and raises physical attack and physical defense of all allies for several turns.

Esperre (voiced by Dawn M. Bennett in English, Aoi Yuuki in Japanese)

  • Job: Apothecary

An apothecary who set off on a journey in order to save as many people as possible. He greatly respects his father who was also an accomplished apothecary, and studies every day in order to live up to that legacy.

—Ultimate Technique: Art of Healing

Remove attribute-reducing effects of all allies, and grant an ally immunity to status ailments for several turns.

Goodwin (voiced by Edward Bosco in English, Satoshi Hino in Japanese)

  • Job: Dancer

Both playwright and actor, he pursues fantastical stories abounding in adventure. He was driven out of the city of the arts due to artistic differences, and attempted to put on performances at sea, only to meet with a shipwreck. This experience inspired him to take up the name of Shipwreck King.

—Ultimate Technique: Song of Levin

Deal lightning damage to all foes, and for 2 turns, deal lightning damage to all foes at the start of turn. Song skill.

Encounter Travelers Who Starred in the Original Octopath Traveler!

  • Ophilia (Cleric)
  • Cyrus (Scholar)
  • Tressa (Merchant)
  • Olberic (Warrior)
  • Primrose (Dancer)
  • Alfyn (Apothecary)
  • Therion (Thief)
  • H’aanit (Hunter)

New Travelers From the Main Story Join You as Companions

  • Bargello
  • Richard
  • Alaune
  • Solon
  • Eltrix
  • Rondo
  • And perhaps more will join you along the way…

Over 30 travelers in total make an appearance. Assemble a party that’s uniquely yours!

■ Path Actions

Path Actions let you perform various actions on people you meet during your journey.

In this game, the actions that can be taken will vary based on your influence and peoples’ values: Wealth, Power, or Fame.

For those who value wealth, you can “Purchase” from or “Hire” them with money.

For those who value power, you can “Contend” against or “Impress” them through combat.

For those who value fame, the success rates of “Entreat” and “Recruit” change based on your influence.

If someone wishes to relocate, you can also “Invite” them to welcome them to your town.

—In the case of “Contend”…

↓

↓

■ Amity Levels

Once you develop the town to a certain level, amity levels become unlocked.

Amity levels indicate the level of closeness between the protagonist and their companions. You can raise them by using the “Inquire Further” Path Action in Wishvale.

Raising amity levels allows you to obtain more valuable items and enhances the capabilities of Resident Skills.

Sometimes special items like a character’s favorite food will be needed, so make full use of your travel knowledge.

■ Party Chat

Party Chat refers to conversation events that occur between your companions based on story progression and various situations.

You can enjoy exchanges that offer glimpses into the bonds and personalities of the characters, as well as the sentiments between them.

If you miss any, you can still view them from the main menu, so take a look whenever you’re curious.

■ Adventure at Sea

Once aboard the ship, you can freely sail the vast ocean.

Discover the mystical Middlesea and the dangerous Outersea.

There, you may encounter uncharted islands and unknown creatures.

Where you set sail is entirely up to you.

Set forth on an adventure at sea to experience a journey unlike any on land.

■ A Consumer Demo With Save Data Carryover is Now Available

A free consumer demo, where save data can be carried over to the full game, is now available on all platforms!

Create your own character and play through the beginning of the story.

You’re free to go wherever you want and do whatever you like within the starting area and the three-hour time limit.

Immerse yourself in the story, develop your own town, or search for companions to journey together.

Embark on an adventure of your own creation.

■ Original Soundtrack

Includes a two-disc CD set featuring exquisite, newly composed music created specifically for Octopath Traveler 0. The accompanying booklet features a special roundtable discussion revealing behind-the-scenes stories from composer Yasunori Nishiki and the music production staff!

2-Disc CD Set / SQEX-11181-2 / $35.99 (before tax)

Scheduled for release in December 2025.
